document_data.name: ''Boots of False Tracks''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Boots of false tracks''''' were [[magic item|magical]] [[boot]]s whose tracks misrepresented the wearer's race.
document_data.Description: The boots could only be worn by [[humanoid]]s.
document_data.Powers: A pair of ''boots of false tracks'' could, at the wearer's choice, leave tracks that were characteristic of a different humanoid race, as long as the chosen type of creature was roughly the same size as the wearer.
